001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils;
002
003import java.time.Instant;
004import java.time.ZoneId;
005import java.time.ZoneOffset;
006import java.time.zone.ZoneRules;
007
008public class CoreDateTimeUtils {
009
010    public static ZoneOffset systemZoneOffset() {
011        return ZoneId.systemDefault().getRules().getOffset(Instant.now());
012    }
013}
